item.title: About
item.description: Personal Link to heading I am Portuguese and like photography, board games and nature walks. I also have a beautiful wife and daughter. Professional Link to heading Software engineer since 2000, I have worked on all sort of projects, but mostly in Data Engineering and data related projects. But my love for computers and software started much early, when I was 11 Years old and got a ZXSpectrum 48K where games came in “music tapes” and would load in 3 to 5 minutes.
